Eco-Friendly Yoga Mat: Use eco-friendly, biodegradable materials to make the yoga mat, which reduces the environmental impact of using plastic or synthetic materials.
Yoga Mat Cleaning System: Introduce a system to make cleaning the yoga mat easier, by using a removable and washable cover that can be easily zipped on and off.
Yoga Mat Bag: Add a built-in bag in the yoga mat itself, allowing yogis to carry their mat with them and keep it protected when not in use.
Grip-enhancing Yoga Mat: Add a textured surface to the underside of the yoga mat that improves grip and prevents slipping during use.
Yoga Mat with Integrated Music Player: Integrate a small, waterproof music player that allows users to listen to their favorite music or guided meditations while practicing yoga.
